article_title: A Word from Dr. Pfenninger: Screening for abdominal aortic aneurysm and lung cancer in smokers
article_text:
Midland, MI (48640)

Today

Mixed clouds and sun with scattered thunderstorms. High 84F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%..

Tonight

Scattered thunderstorms during the evening. Partly cloudy skies after midnight. Low 63F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

article_metadata.author: Dr. John L. Pfenninger for the Daily News

og.description: It is well-known that smoking leads to multiple cancers. It is less well-known that smoking also causes aneurysms in the abdominal aorta (the major blood vessel running along the spine).
